snippet: A propane tank on a food truck exploded in North Philadelphia on Tuesday, sending a huge fireball into the sky and injuring at least 11 people.
abstract: Propane tank on a food truck explodes in North Philadelphia, sending a huge fireball into the sky and injuring at least 11 people, including two who suffered serious burns.
lead_paragraph: A propane tank on a food truck exploded in North Philadelphia on Tuesday, sending a huge fireball into the sky and injuring at least 11 people.
